ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule applies when someone tries to close the case as Funding Denied or Cancelled, even though the funding decision is Extended.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( EDRD_MOHFunding_Decision__c, "Extended"), OR(ISPICKVAL( Status, "Cancelled"), ISPICKVAL( Status, "Funding Denied")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Funding decision is Extended, then case cannot be closed as Funding Denied or Cancelled.
